name: Constellarium
description:
★★ Take a quiet moment to lose yourself among the stars ★★

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Constellarium is a digital-soundscape toy in  which you can create your own constellations. Join stars and relax as gentle arpeggios play out along the images you have created. 

Create a quiet moment alone and breathe. Tell a story with pictures and hear it play out. Spell out your favourite word and listen to the music it generates. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You deserve a gentle moment today ❤️
